welcome_message_body: Welcome to Euxton, a charming town in the United Kingdom known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Euxton has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Blackpool Airport is used for transporting goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a wide range of shops, restaurants, and lounges for passengers to enjoy.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds.
